name: Sub-PRD: T-500 - Full platform checkpoint: all features verified across all chapters
description: Sub-PRD breaking down T-500 into manageable tasks. Systematically verifies all platform features across every chapter to ensure consistency and zero regressions.
parentGuarantees: All features work across all chapters
No console errors on any page

tasks.name: Chapter inventory and build verification
tasks.intent: Establish baseline: know exactly which chapters exist and confirm the app builds cleanly
tasks.description: Enumerate all chapters in the codebase, confirm the production build succeeds with zero errors, and document the chapter list for systematic testing in subsequent tasks.
guarantees: Complete chapter list documented
Production build passes with zero errors
tasks.validation: npm run build exits 0 and chapter list is captured
actions: Read src/data/ to enumerate all chapter definitions
Run npm run build and confirm zero errors
Document the full list of chapter routes for use in subsequent tasks

tasks.name: Console error audit across all chapter pages
tasks.intent: Ensure no JavaScript errors or warnings appear on any chapter page
tasks.description: Navigate to every chapter page programmatically and capture browser console output. Fix any errors or warnings found.
requires: Production build passes with zero errors
guarantees: Zero console errors on all chapter pages
Zero console warnings on all chapter pages
tasks.validation: Browser automation navigates all chapter routes and console shows no errors
actions: Start dev server
Use Playwright to navigate to each chapter route
Capture console messages on each page
Fix any errors or warnings found
Re-verify all pages are clean

tasks.name: Dark mode consistency across all chapters
tasks.intent: Verify dark mode renders correctly on every chapter without visual glitches or unthemed elements
tasks.description: Toggle dark mode and visit every chapter page, checking for unstyled elements, incorrect colors, or missing dark mode classes. Fix any inconsistencies.
guarantees: Dark mode renders correctly on all chapter pages
No unstyled or unthemed elements in dark mode
tasks.validation: Visual inspection via screenshots of each chapter in dark mode shows consistent theming
actions: Start dev server and enable dark mode
Navigate to each chapter page in dark mode
Take screenshots and inspect for unthemed elements
Fix any dark mode styling issues found
Re-verify fixed pages

tasks.name: Search indexes all chapter content
tasks.intent: Verify the search modal finds content from every chapter, not just a subset
tasks.description: Open the search modal (Cmd+K) and search for unique terms from each chapter. Confirm results appear for all chapters and links navigate correctly.
guarantees: Search returns results from every chapter
Search result links navigate to correct chapter sections
tasks.validation: Searching unique terms from each chapter returns relevant results and navigation works
actions: Start dev server
Open search modal
Search for a unique term from each chapter
Verify results appear for all chapters
Click results and verify correct navigation

tasks.name: Chapter navigation and page transitions verified
tasks.intent: Ensure page transitions and navigation work smoothly between all chapters
tasks.description: Navigate sequentially through all chapters using next/previous controls and sidebar links. Verify transitions animate correctly and no navigation dead ends exist.
guarantees: All chapter navigation links work
Page transitions animate correctly between all chapters
tasks.validation: Sequential navigation through all chapters completes without errors or broken links
actions: Start dev server at home page
Navigate through each chapter sequentially
Verify page transition animations fire
Test sidebar navigation to each chapter
Fix any broken links or missing transitions

tasks.name: Keyboard accessibility across all chapters
tasks.intent: Verify keyboard navigation works on every chapter's interactive elements
tasks.description: Tab through interactive elements on each chapter page. Verify focus indicators, keyboard activation of buttons/links, and no focus traps.
guarantees: All interactive elements keyboard-accessible on every chapter
No focus traps on any chapter page
tasks.validation: Tab navigation through each chapter reaches all interactive elements without traps
actions: Start dev server
Navigate to each chapter
Tab through all interactive elements
Verify focus indicators are visible
Fix any keyboard accessibility issues found

tasks.name: Print styles work for all chapters
tasks.intent: Verify print-friendly styles render correctly for every chapter's study materials
tasks.description: Trigger print preview or generate print output for each chapter and verify the print styles apply correctly without layout issues.
guarantees: Print styles render correctly for all chapters
No layout overflow or broken elements in print view
tasks.validation: Print preview of each chapter shows properly formatted content
actions: Start dev server
Navigate to each chapter
Trigger print media emulation
Verify layout and styling in print mode
Fix any print styling issues found

tasks.name: Chapter-specific interactive features verified
tasks.intent: Verify chapter-specific features like diagrams, code blocks, quizzes, and tutorials work on every chapter that has them
tasks.description: Test interactive elements unique to each chapter: clickable diagram nodes, code term modals, quiz functionality, and tutorial step navigation. Fix any chapter-specific bugs.
requires: Zero console errors on all chapter pages
guarantees: Diagram interactions work on all chapters with diagrams
Code term modals open correctly on all chapters
Quizzes function on all chapters with quizzes
tasks.validation: Interactive elements on each chapter respond correctly to user interaction
actions: Identify which chapters have diagrams, code terms, quizzes, tutorials
Test diagram node clicks and View in Code links per chapter
Test code term highlighting and modal popups per chapter
Test quiz submission and scoring per chapter
Fix any chapter-specific bugs found

tasks.name: Final verification: all parent guarantees satisfied
tasks.intent: Comprehensive final check proving all parent task guarantees are met
tasks.description: Run a full end-to-end verification covering all parent guarantees: all features work across all chapters, no chapter-specific bugs remain, dark mode is consistent, search indexes everything, and no console errors exist.
requires: Zero console errors on all chapter pages
Dark mode renders correctly on all chapter pages
Search returns results from every chapter
All interactive elements keyboard-accessible on every chapter
Print styles render correctly for all chapters
Diagram interactions work on all chapters with diagrams
guarantees: All features work across all chapters
No chapter-specific bugs
Dark mode consistent everywhere
Search indexes all content
No console errors on any page
tasks.validation: Full automated and manual pass through all chapters confirms zero errors, consistent dark mode, complete search indexing, and all features operational
actions: Run production build and confirm zero errors
Run automated navigation through all chapters checking console
Spot-check dark mode on 3 representative chapters
Search for terms from first, middle, and last chapters
Confirm all parent guarantees are satisfied
